tool_description:
The most reliable public proxy servers list.
Thousands of http and socks proxies tested daily.
name: Public Proxies
title: Public Proxies

api_list.name: proxies.json

optional_parameters.name: alive
optional_parameters.description: Only retrieve proxies that were tested to be working within the last 5 minutes. DEFAULT: true

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies at this location. Comma-separate multiple values to search with OR condition. DEFAULT: All countries

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies with a type. Comma-separate multiple values to search with OR condition. DEFAULT: elite,anonymous,transparent

optional_parameters.name: protocols
optional_parameters.description: Add this to retrieve only proxies with a specific protocol. Comma-separate multiple values to search with OR condition. DEFAULT: http,socks4,socks5
